This strategy allows me to adapt to the current situation while still being able to hunt effectively if the opportunity arises.

With more wolves around, hunting at maximum intensity could lead to competition and overexploitation of the remaining sheep. By lowering my intensity, I can conserve energy and wait for a better opportunity while still contributing to the pack
